definition: to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: But sometimes, ISP's and mail service businesses have no interest in righting what went wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有時，互聯網的業務和郵件服務沒有興趣糾正想歪。

sentences.english: If my little bit wrong incoming letter word disease sentence invites help correct that.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的來信有一些錯詞病句請幫忙糾正。

sentences.english: When nonconforming product is corrected it shall be subject to re-verification to demonstrate conformity to the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 應對糾正後的產品再次進行驗證，以證實符合要求。

sentences.english: Errors are usually less expensive to correct than in implementation.
sentences.chinese: 糾正錯誤的成本比在實現中要低。

sentences.english: Competition can have a powerful corrective effect on market inefficiencies and mis pricings.
sentences.chinese: 競爭能夠有效糾正市場的無效和錯誤定價。

sentences.english: This situation needs to be corrected.
When a mistake is discovered, it should be corrected at once.
Rectification of this fault is achieved by insertion of a wedge.
sentences.chinese: 嵌入一個楔子就可糾正誤差。

sentences.english: It has taken a philosophical shift for researchers to rectify this.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員爲了糾正這一點已經採取哲學上的轉變。

sentences.english: Inefficient uterine action should be corrected before attributing dystocia to a pelvic problem.
sentences.chinese: 在骨盆問題引起的難產前，無效的宮縮應該加以糾正。

sentences.english: In addition, the patient or surrogate may correct any historical misinformation at this time.
sentences.chinese: 病人或代訴者還可在此時糾正病史中的一些錯誤信息。

sentences.english: We must guard against and redress all forms of covert protectionist activities.
sentences.chinese: 要警惕和糾正形形色色的隱性保護主義行爲。

sentences.english: This gives you the opportunity to correct the particular fault.
sentences.chinese: 因爲，它給你一個機遇來糾正這個特別的毛病。

sentences.english: Establish effective preventive measures and corrective action to ensure that deficiencies do not re-occur.
sentences.chinese: 確立有效的預防措施和糾正措施，避免錯誤再次出現。

sentences.english: Any safety deficiencies or violations must be corrected immediately before proceeding with operations.
sentences.chinese: 操作前，必須糾正所有的安全隱患和違章。

sentences.english: At the same time, the error code in communication is corrected by using of repeat transmittal of data in every cycle.
sentences.chinese: 同時使用數據循環重發，來糾正數據傳輸中的誤碼。
